camp_dettagli_traccimaneto.camp_singola_domanda_text: Which sentence below is more appropriate, with reference to Risk Management?
camp_dettagli_traccimaneto.camp_singola_domanda_risposta_data_text: Risk management is the role of the Corporate Management Team

camp_singola_domanda_parco_risposte.camp_singola_domanda_risposta_1_text: Risk management is the essential role of Internal Audit
camp_singola_domanda_parco_risposte.camp_singola_domanda_risposta_2_text: Risk management is the role of the Corporate Management Team
camp_singola_domanda_parco_risposte.camp_singola_domanda_risposta_3_text: Risk management is the role of Corporate Audit, PWC and the External Auditors
camp_singola_domanda_parco_risposte.camp_singola_domanda_risposta_4_text: Risk management is a task for the entire organization, coordinated by Internal Audit and supervised by the Risk Committee together with the Board of Directors
